contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox French commune |name = Quantilly |region = Centre |department = Cher |arrondissement = Bourges |canton = Saint-Martin-d'Auxigny |INSEE = 18189 |postal code = 18110 |mayor = Béatrice Damade |term = 2008–2014 |intercommunality = [[Communauté de communes en Terres Vives|Terres Vives]] |longitude = 2.4456 |latitude = 47.225 |elevation m = 225 |elevation min m = 161 |elevation max m = 286 |area km2 = 12.69 |population = 430 |population date = 2008 }} '''Quantilly''' is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Cher (department)|Cher]] [[Departments of France|department]] in the [[Centre (French region)|Centre]] [[Regions of France|region]] of [[France]]. ==Geography== An area of [[vineyard]]s, [[forestry]] and [[farming]] comprising the village and two hamlets situated some {{convert|10|mi|km}} north of [[Bourges]], at the junction of the D16, D208 and the D59 roads. The grapes for Menetou-Salon wine are grown here. ==Population== {{Historical populations |align=left| 1962|400| 1968|401| 1975|352| 1982|346| 1990|456| 1999|442| 2008|430| }} {{clear-left}} ==Sights== * The church of St. Genou, dating from the eighteenth century. * The nineteenth-century chateau of Champgrand. * The eighteenth-century chateau of Quantilly. ==See also== *[[Communes of the Cher department]] ==References== *[http://www.insee.fr/en/home/home_page.asp INSEE] {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.quid.fr/communes.html?mode=detail&id=9833&req=Quantilly Quantilly on the Quid website] {{Fr}} {{commonscat}} {{Cher communes}} [[Category:Communes of Cher (department)]]
